alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Miami-Dade County through 115 AM EDT... At 1230 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Miccosukee Resort to 7 miles east of Mahogany Hammock. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Miami Beach, Homestead, Coral Gables, Key Biscayne, South Miami, Surfside, Homestead General Airport, Turkey Point, Virginia Key, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, The Redland, Kendall, Miami Gardens, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach and Miami Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
